Watching How to Live Mortgage Free and it’s just so depressing.
It’s like “are you CRIPPLED by RENT? 😅 Never going to be able to afford your own home?? 😜 Just buy a BOAT and move it every two weeks until you DIE 🛶☠️”

We went on the rollercoaster in Tayto Park seven times and I think some of my organs may have moved around but it was worth it tbh.

I am really upset that Goodfella’s chose falafel for their vegan pizza. It’s like they did it just to taunt us.
I am so sad the spice bag crisps don’t taste like spice bag.
Storm AliExpress
From this moment forward, I will be responding with “human flesh” when people ask what I even eat after they find out I’m vegan.

Think of all the small talk we’re going to get out of this wind: - feels very autumn doesn’t it - the hat was nearly blown off me - remember ophelia - still a bit clammy isn’t it - will we get the snow I wonder - global warming

I couldn’t work out how how my taxi driver was simultaneously playing soft piano music and ed sheeran at the same time and just before I built up the courage to ask him to turn it off I realised the piano music had been playing from my phone for the ENTIRE JOURNEY.
